examples.title: Count machines by OS platform
examples.question: Get count() from all machines group by OS Platform

examples.title: High CPU Windows workstations
examples.question: Get Computer Name and CPU Percent from machines with Operating System contains "Windows" and Computer Role equals "Workstation" and CPU Percent is greater than "65" order by CPU Percent desc limit 5

examples.title: Laptop disk capacity
examples.question: Get Computer Name, Disk Free GB, Memory GB from group "Laptops" order by Disk Free GB

examples.title: Average disk free by group
examples.question: Get avg(Disk Free GB), max(Disk Free GB) from all machines group by Group
